posts.post_content:
*sold* Card has no creases and still has factory style gloss.  Unfortunately, when I sent it in to be slabbed it it came back trimmed. The card looks like an 8+ with great centering.  I was originally asking $1200, but now open to offers.  DM me if you have any questions. 

[url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ppmwmcb4lftki12/T206%20Johnson%20Front.jpg?dl=0[/url]

[url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/byelb1z3ay0redg/t206%20Johnson%20Back.jpg?dl=0[/url]
Did not get any interest to start.  Listening to offers.
What a shame that somebody trimmed that, because it has really nice eye appeal.  Id possible be interested if you want to PM me what you are looking for it. Thanks.
A few nibbles but no bites.
